cid_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'cccp' || !doc.cid || !doc.active || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.cid, {'id': doc._id, 'account_id': doc.pvt_account_id, 'outbound_cid':doc.outbound_cid, 'user_id':doc.user_id}); }

crossbar_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'cccp' || !doc.active || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc._id, {'id': doc._id, 'account_id': doc.pvt_account_id, 'outbound_cid':doc.outbound_cid, 'user_id':doc.user_id, 'cid':doc.cid, 'pin':doc.pin}); }

pin_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'cccp' || !doc.pin || !doc.active || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.pin, {'id': doc._id, 'account_id': doc.pvt_account_id, 'outbound_cid':doc.outbound_cid, 'user_id':doc.user_id}); }
